reviewDescription: I recently purchased the Ptron 10W Wireless Speaker, and it has exceeded my expectations in more ways than one. As an avid music enthusiast, I was searching for a compact yet powerful wireless speaker, and Ptron delivered just that.Design and Build Quality:The speaker's design is sleek and modern, making it a stylish addition to any space. The build quality is impressive, with a robust feel that instills confidence in its durability. The compact size makes it highly portable, perfect for on-the-go use.Sound Quality:The 10W output of this speaker packs a punch! The sound is crisp, clear, and surprisingly loud for its size. The bass is deep, and the mids and highs are well-balanced. Whether I'm listening to my favorite tracks at home or outdoors, the audio quality remains consistently impressive.Wireless Connectivity:Setting up the wireless connection was a breeze. The Bluetooth pairing is seamless and quick, and I appreciate the stable connection it maintains. The wireless range is excellent, allowing me to move around without losing audio quality.Battery Life:The battery life on this speaker is impressive. It lasts for hours on a single charge, making it perfect for long listening sessions or outings. The low battery indicator is a helpful feature, ensuring I'm never caught off guard.User-Friendly Features:I appreciate the user-friendly design of this speaker. The intuitive controls make it easy to adjust volume, skip tracks,easy connection to the blutooth.The inclusion of AUX,BLUETOOTH,USB,TF CARD makes it worthy in this price segment.Value for Money:In terms of value for money, the Ptron 10W Wireless Speaker stands out. It competes with higher-priced options in terms of performance but remains budget-friendly. The quality you get for the price is truly impressive.In conclusion, the Ptron 10W Wireless Speaker has become my go-to audio companion. It combines sleek design, impressive sound quality, and user-friendly features‚Äîall at an affordable price. Whether you're a music lover or just need a reliable speaker for various occasions, the Ptron 10W is a solid choice

reviewTitle: Defective product. Charging pin doesn't work
reviewDescription: Worst product. Don't purchase it. Within 2 weeks of purchasing this product, the charging port started giving problem. The charging pin had to manually aligned at an upward angle for the charging to happen. One and half month after the purchase date, the charging port completely detached and went inside the body of the device. So charging is not possible as charging pin cannot be inserted inside the device. For the last one and half months, the product is lying completely useless. I was able to use this product only for one and half months and even then it was not functioning properly. I demand a full refund or else product replacement immediately.

I had a great experience with this Bluetooth speaker. It has very crisp and clear sound with adequate bass and treble as it has two separate speakers. It has Bluetooth connectivity connectivity, MicroSD and USB also. It has also very useful feature which I loved most i.e. It is chargeable which takes less time to charge it fully and give very long battery backup. It has a led light with separate button to switch it on and off and this led light is very useful as it can be used as torch light. After all it is all over a very useful and entertainment packed source at its worthy price.

This compact dynamo delivers immersive sound, impressive playtime, and versatility, making it an ideal companion for music lovers on-the-go.Sound quality is exceptional, with clear vocals and decent bass response. It doesn't have durability plus it's structure was broken. Please don't buy it.
